name: sorted(on:_:_:order:)
desc: Generates a data frame by copying the data frameâ€™s rows and then sorting the rows according to three columns that you select by their column identifiers.
declaration: func sorted<T0, T1, T2>(on columnID0: ColumnID<T0>, _ columnID1: ColumnID<T1>, _ columnID2: ColumnID<T2>, order: Order = .ascending) -> DataFrame where T0 : Comparable, T1 : Comparable, T2 : Comparable
